gamerule.propSnatching.description: Controls whether or not props being held by a player are able to be grabbed by other players without being dropped first.
gamerule.toxicGooSourceConversion.descri: When flowing toxic goo is surrounded on two sides by toxic goo sources it converts into a source.
gamerule.toxicGooDamage.description: Damage (per second) toxic goo deals to entities touching it.
gamerule.portalPositionSnapping.descript: Controls the position alignment of portals to blocks, in fractions of a full block (1/n).  Setting to 0 disables position snapping entirely.
gamerule.portalRotationSnapping.descript: Controls the rotation alignment of portals placed on floors and ceilings, in degrees.  Setting to 90 aligns portals with blocks, and setting to 0 disables rotation snapping entirely.
gamerule.portalsVanishOnDeath.descriptio: Whether player-placed portals vanish when that player dies.
gamerule.portalShotRangeLimit.descriptio: The range limit of a portal shot, in blocks.
gamerule.restrictValidPortalSurfaces.des: Changes the list of valid portal surface blocks from a blacklist (#portalcubed:cant_place_portal_on) to a whitelist (#portalcubed:unrestricted_portal_surfaces). Intended for use in custom maps.
gamerule.disableManualPortalClearing.des: Disables the ability for players to clear their portals with a keybind. Intended for use in custom maps.
gamerule.disablePortalValidation.descrip: Disables placement checks when shooting portals, allowing them to be placed on any surface, including overhangs. May cause unexpected behavior - Issues caused by invalid portals will not be fixed.
gamerule.allowCrouchFlyGlitch.descriptio: Enables the Excursion Funnel Crouch Fly Glitch from Portal 2.
container.portalcubed.construction_canno: Shows a translucent preview of how the selected construct will be placed
Replaces certain blocks that are already there when placing the construct.  Most blocks cannot be replaced.
This tag does not have any contents.
